Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory801.jpg'}
{3: 'Walking on the spacious streets of Constellia, a giant display board catches your eye.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: '"Valentine\'s Day Limited: Golden Age Classic Movie Theater"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Want to give it a shot?', 3: '7', 4: 'Maybe skip the games this time?', 5: '7'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Sure! Commandant, let's go check it out too!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Uh... "A Must-Watch Recommendation, \'To You in Winter,\' a classic tear-jerking love story that made the whole world cry" seems to be the cinema\'s top pick!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I have a bad feeling about this just from the title.', 3: '12', 4: "Is it really okay to watch a tragic love story on Valentine's Day?", 5: '12'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Let me see... looks like this is the only one with seats left.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'This just got even more complicated.', 3: '14'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'How about we still try to find an arcade?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's stick to this.", 3: '16'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Sure, the intro said it's a classic movie from the Golden Age, gotta be fun!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "The movie's about to start, Commandant. Let's hurry inside.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory549.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Kamui has bought two large buckets of popcorn, excitedly pulling you into a seat in the dimly lit cinemaâ€”the movie begins.'}
{1: '"How could this be? I finally found you, and now you\'re just going to leave with him?"', 3: '60'}
{3: '"How could this be? I finally found you, and now you\'re just going to leave with him?"'}
{1: '"I won\'t let go of you again, even if leaving Wang Corporation means facing a harsh winter. We can weather it together!"', 3: '55'}
{3: '"I won\'t let go of you again, even if leaving Wang Corporation means facing a harsh winter. We can weather it together!"'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory529.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '0.5', 5: '1'}
{3: 'The two protagonists, accompanied by lines that scream classic, step into the snowfield, and in that moment, the dim cinema is illuminated by the snowy landscape.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You happen to see Kamui, holding popcorn, looking over at me.'}
{3: '"Even so... I love you!"'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory529.jpg', 3: '0.5', 4: '0', 5: '1'}
{3: 'He smiles in the dimming light.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory529.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: 'The movie tries its best to make you cry, but the audience just walks out with blank faces.'}
{3: "Total bomb, that's what it is."}
{2: 'Never thought...', 3: '46', 4: 'This movie...', 5: '46'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Commandant, I didn't know movies could be so interesting!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I figured once the main characters sort things out, they'd ride off into the sunset. Didn't expect a whole new challenge to pop up.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'What happens now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Guess that means no sequel.', 3: '52'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'So we never get to see how it ends?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Did you enjoy the movie?', 3: '54'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Enjoy? Not really, if we're talking about the actual story.", 4: '1'}
{2: "That's what I'm talking about...", 3: '56'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "But hey, I think it's kind of cool this way too.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kamui laughs, waving the two ticket stubs in the air.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Next time we have a chance, let's catch another movie!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Heard Golden Age audiences used to collect ticket stubs, so I'm going to keep these safe.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Once we watch a bunch of movies, we'll have our own special collection.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sounds good to me.', 3: '65', 4: 'Not a bad idea.', 5: '65'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "But hey, we don't have to just watch movies.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Kamui's smile is like sunshine."}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "As long as I'm with you, Commandant, I'm happy no matter what we do.", 4: '1'}
